item.title: FA-990xx || Chapter One || Awakening
item.description: On a golden throne a master of a world sleeps, peacefully in ignorant bless from the flames approaching his people. On a golden tower a jester sings a song, humoring the guards about their approaching demise. On a golden bridge a widow’s tears falls into the river, but it joins no water and evaporates into nothingness. On a golden cliff, no sun shines on it. no warmth to stop anyone from embracing the ice cold darkness from the fall.
